name: Smoker
text: DON!!x1 This Character cannot be K.O'd when battling characters without the (Special) attribute.

effect.text: This Character cannot be K.O'd when battling characters without the (Special) attribute.

meta.notes: Card marked as 'SAMPLE' and 'SPECIAL' in the image, but rarity is confirmed as 'SP' from the printed text. Power is clearly 5000. No life value printed.
